Class View

java.lang.Object
View
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class View extends Object implements ViewInterface
Implementation of the View. The view handles user interface elements and presentation logic. It provides visual representations of portfolio data and interacts with users through a command-line interface (CLI)

      Parameters:

    • showTickerMatches

      public void showTickerMatches​(String csvContents)
      Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
      The user can look up ticker symbols that match the name of a company, or all ticker symbols that start with the inputted string. Else where the program will query Alpha Vantage for a list of matching results. This method will display the top ticker symbols output by Alpha Vantage.
      Specified by:
      showTickerMatches in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      csvContents - data in csv format of the ticker symbol matches for a user query. The columns output by Alpha Vantage are symbol, name, type, region, marketOpen, marketClose, timezone, currency, and matchScore.

    • displayPortfolioValue

      public void displayPortfolioValue​(String portfolioName, String date, float value)
      Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
      Prints the name of a portfolio and its value on a certain date, and prints the date.
      Specified by:
      displayPortfolioValue in interface ViewInterface
      Parameters:
      portfolioName - the name of the portfolio that the list command was run on.
      date - the date that the value of the portfolio was determined for. MM/DD/YYYY format.
      value - the total value of the portfolio.
